Question: Kawei Electronic (Hangzhou) Co. Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Kawei Electronic (Hangzhou) Co. Ltd.

CES 2024 Highlight:

- Manufacturer of professional stage acoustics
- Over 20 years of experience in design, research, and production
- Products include CD players, PA sound consoles, DJ mixers, professional speaker boxes, DSP digital effective devices, and equalizers
- Endorsed with CE, RoHS, and UL certificates
- Markets include America, EU, Australia, Africa, and other countries
- Welcomes OEM and ODM business proposals
- Superior quality, excellent services, and competitive prices

No CES 2024 product details were provided.
